entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Valemount
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
